topic.title: Exercise: rapp001 - Sales per region per box

section.p: Create a report with the sales per region per box. The report should also show the total sales for each region and the percentage across all regions. Name the report rapp001.

ol.li: Choose as data source the query Sales per region per box and add all fields. Set grouping level on field Region. Sort ascending on field BoxName. Choose at Summary Options for Sum, show Detail and Summary, and Calculate percent of total for sums.
If necessary adjust column widths and formatting of the sales values.
